page.title: 12Jamage Industrial Estate
page.content: The Jamage Industrial Estate was built on land where the old Jamage Colliery used to be.The council built a round the area and then Normid Cooperative Society built a giant hypermarket store there.Since then two other shops have op pened;"Queensway"which sells furniture and"B+Q"which sells gardening aquipment and DIY aquipment "B+Q" used to be called "Dodge City". There are also factories and warehouses on the Jamage Industrial Estate.There are the Michelin Tyre Company,Walkers Century Oils,Archer Woodnut(a engernering ferm)and Oil Comparny. Recently some old pit tips have been levelled off and more factories are going to be built.Many local peopl have objected to this as they don't want more factories near to their homes.
